description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期法家代表思想家韩非的论著，为法家集大成的思想作品，对社会各领域有系统的阐发，并对统治技术进行深度探究。
description.en: A work by the Legalist thinker Han Fei from the pre-Qin period of China. It is a comprehensive masterpiece of Legalist thought, systematically elaborating on various social fields and deeply exploring techniques of governance.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期法家代表思想家，著有《韩非子》一书。
description.en: A representative Legalist thinker during the pre-Qin period of China, author of the book 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诸子百家之一，提倡以法治国。
description.en: One of the Hundred Schools of Thought in ancient China, advocating for governance by law.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期的儒家思想家，韩非的老师。
description.en: A Confucian thinker from the pre-Qin period of China, and the teacher of Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 由孔子创立的中国古代思想学派，强调仁、义、礼、智、信。
description.en: A school of thought in ancient China founded by Confucius, emphasizing benevolence, righteousness, propriety, wisdom, and trustworthiness.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期的思想家，《道德经》的作者。
description.en: A thinker from the pre-Qin period of China, author of the 'Tao Te Ching'.

description.zh-cn: 中国先秦时期老子的作品，道家思想的核心著作。
description.en: A work by Laozi from the pre-Qin period of China, the core text of Taoist thought.

description.zh-cn: 中国秦朝的开国皇帝，统一六国。他非常重视《韩非子》中的《孤愤》、《五蠹》等篇章。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Qin Dynasty in China, who unified the six states. He highly valued chapters such as 'Gufen' and 'Wudu' in 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 指代国家的最高统治者，是《韩非子》中法、术、势理论的主要实施对象。
description.en: Refers to the supreme ruler of a state, the main subject for the implementation of the theories of law, technique, and power in 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的法家代表人物，其思想对韩非有重要影响。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school during the Warring States period of China, whose thoughts significantly influenced Han Fei.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的法家思想家，其关于“势”的理论是韩非思想的来源之一。
description.en: A Legalist thinker during the Warring States period of China, whose theory on 'shi' (power/authority) was one of the sources of Han Fei's thought.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的法家思想家，其关于“术”的理论是韩非思想的来源之一。
description.en: A Legalist thinker during the Warring States period of China, whose theory on 'shu' (method/technique) was one of the sources of Han Fei's thought.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想学派，在《韩非子》中受到批判。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought, criticized in 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》中的一个概念，指韩非认为扰乱君王法治、危损国家的五种人。
description.en: A concept in 'Han Feizi' referring to five types of people whom Han Fei believed disturbed the monarch's rule of law and harmed the state.

description.zh-cn: 源自《韩非子·难一》的成语，比喻言语或行事前后无法呼应，互相抵触。
description.en: An idiom originating from 'Han Feizi, Nan Yi', used to describe words or actions that are inconsistent and mutually conflicting.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期韩国的君主，韩非曾向其上书建言。
description.en: The monarch of the state of Han during the Warring States period, to whom Han Fei submitted proposals.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想家，儒家学派创始人。《韩非子》中对其部分观点进行了否定。
description.en: An ancient Chinese thinker and founder of the Confucian school of thought. Some of his views were refuted in 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是《韩非子》一书的作者。
description.en: Han Fei is the author of the book 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾就学于荀子，是其学生。
description.en: Han Fei studied under Xunzi and was his student.

description.zh-cn: 荀子是儒家的代表人物之一。
description.en: Xunzi is one of the representative figures of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾推究老子的思想，并将其“无为”等概念应用于法家理论中。
description.en: Han Fei studied the thought of Laozi and applied concepts such as 'wu wei' (non-action) to Legalist theory.

description.zh-cn: 韩非系统研究了商鞅的变法，并多次引述其法家观点，是其思想的重要来源。
description.en: Han Fei systematically studied Shang Yang's reforms and repeatedly cited his Legalist views, making it an important source of his own thought.

description.zh-cn: 慎到关于“势”的理论是韩非思想的来源之一。
description.en: Shen Dao's theory on 'shi' (power/authority) was one of the sources of Han Fei's thought.

description.zh-cn: 申不害关于“术”的理论是韩非思想的来源之一。
description.en: Shen Buhai's theory on 'shu' (method/technique) was one of the sources of Han Fei's thought.

description.zh-cn: 韩非是法家的代表思想家。
description.en: Han Fei is a representative thinker of Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》中的《解老》、《喩老》篇是对《道德经》的论注。
description.en: The chapters 'Jie Lao' and 'Yu Lao' in 'Han Feizi' are commentaries on the 'Tao Te Ching'.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇读到《韩非子》中的《孤愤》、《五蠹》等篇章后，表示了高度的赞赏和重视。
description.en: After reading chapters such as 'Gufen' and 'Wudu' in 'Han Feizi', Qin Shi Huang expressed great admiration and attached high importance to them.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》的理论旨在为君主提供富国强兵的统治思想和技术。
description.en: 'Han Feizi's' theories are intended to provide monarchs with governing ideologies and techniques for enriching the state and strengthening the army.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》在《显学》、《奸劫弑臣》等篇章中对儒家思想进行了批判。
description.en: 'Han Feizi' criticizes Confucian thought in chapters such as 'Xian Xue' and 'Jian Jie Shi Chen'.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》在《显学》等篇章中对墨家思想进行了批判。
description.en: 'Han Feizi' criticizes Mohist thought in chapters such as 'Xian Xue'.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子》在《五蠹》篇中提出了“五蠹”的概念。
description.en: 'Han Feizi' introduces the concept of the 'Five Vermin' in the chapter of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 成语“自相矛盾”源于《韩非子·难一》篇中的一则寓言。
description.en: The idiom 'zì xiāng máo dùn' (self-contradiction) originates from a fable in the 'Nan Yi' chapter of 'Han Feizi'.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾向当时的韩王上书，提出自己的政治主张和计策。
description.en: Han Fei submitted memorials to the then King of Han, proposing his political ideas and strategies.

description.zh-cn: 韩非曾向秦王上书《存韩》，希望说服秦王保存韩国。
description.en: Han Fei submitted 'Cun Han' (On Preserving Han) to the King of Qin, hoping to persuade him to spare the state of Han.

description.zh-cn: 《韩非子·难二》篇否定了孔子对周文王所作的“仁”和“智”的评价。
description.en: The 'Nan Er' chapter of 'Han Feizi' refutes Confucius's evaluation of King Wen of Zhou as being 'benevolent' and 'wise'.
